metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14733 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
AdPlug 2.3.1 has multiple heap-based buffer overflows in CradLoader::load() in rad.cpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

adplug-utils - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
libadplug-2.3.3-0 - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adplug package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.3+dfsg-2').
